alert.note: Alert for Barry; Christian; Stone; Taney (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 23 at 5:53PM CDT until March 23 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Taney County in southwestern Missouri... Christian County in southwestern Missouri... Central Stone County in southwestern Missouri... Northeastern Barry County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 553 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Galena, or 13 miles southeast of Aurora, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Nixa, Ozark, Table Rock Lake, Shepherd of the Hills State Park, Sparta, Crane, Shell Knob, Reeds Spring, Highlandville, Fremont Hills, Branson West, Galena, Mccord Bend, Hurley, Spokane, Oldfield, Elkhead, Chestnutridge, Ponce de Leon and Chadwick. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
